evidence_extraction:
[
  "The political philosophy of black nationalism only means that the black man should control the politics and the politicians in his own community.",
  "The time when white people can come in our community and get us to vote for them so that they can be our political leaders and tell us what to do and not to do is long gone.",
  "His gospel is white nationalism, our gospel is black nationalism.",
  "Second-class citizenship is nothing but 20th slavery.",
  "We have injected ourselves into the civil rights struggle. And we intend to expand it from the level of civil rights to the level of human rights.",
  "America... All she's got to do is give the black man in this country everything that's due him, everything.",
  "Whenever you got a racial powder keg sitting in your lap, you're in more trouble than if you had an atomic powder keg sitting in your lap.",
  "We don't see any American dream. We've experienced only the American nightmare. We haven't benefited from America's democracy. We've only suffered from America's hypocrisy.",
  "If you don't see it you're finished. If you don't see it you're going to become involved in some action in which you don't have a chance.",
  "Black nationalism is a self-help philosophy.",
  "It'll take black nationalism today to remove colonialism from the backs and the minds of twenty-two million Afro-Americans, here in this country, where we have suffered colonialism for the past 400 years.",
  "America... can become involved in a revolution that won't take bloodshed. All she's got to do is give the black man in this country everything that's due him, everything.",
  "The community in which you spend your money becomes richer and richer, the community out of which you take your money becomes poorer and poorer.",
  "The man who is controlling the stores in our community is a man who doesn't look like we do. He's a man who doesn't even live in the community.",
  "He made a chump out of you. He made a fool out of you. He made you think you were going somewhere and you end up going nowhere...",
  "When we look at other parts of this Earth upon which we live, we find that black, brown, red and yellow people in Africa and Asia are getting their independence.",
  "Cassius Clay can sing. But singing didn't help him to become the heavyweight champion of the world. Swinging helped him.",
  "Join any kind of organization – civic, religious, fraternal, political or otherwise that's based on lifting the black man up and making him master of his own community.",
  "Mr. Moderator, Rev. Cleage, brothers and sisters and friends, and I see some enemies.",
  "Anytime you have to rely upon your enemy for a job, you're in bad shape. When you — and he is your enemy.",
  "He's a crook, he's a hypocrite. Here he is standing up in front of other people, Uncle Sam, with the blood of your and mine mothers and fathers on his hands. With the blood dripping down his jaws like a bloody-jawed wolf.",
  "We got to unite. We got to work together in unity and harmony.",
  "We all have the same problem... All of us catch hell from the same enemy. We're all in the same bag, in the same boat.",
  "No, I'm not for separation and you're not for integration, what you and I are for is freedom.",
  "The political philosophy of black nationalism only means that the black man should control the politics and the politicians in his own community.",
  "The time when white people can come in our community and get us to vote for them... is long gone.",
  "Revolutions overturn systems. Revolutions destroy systems.",
  "We got to unite. We got to work together in unity and harmony.",
  "What you and I are for is freedom.",
  "Join any kind of organization – civic, religious, fraternal, political or otherwise that's based on lifting the black man up and making him master of his own community."
]
